mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE ( USER_ID, QUESTION, ANSWER, MODE, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{mode}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_ID, QUESTION, ANSWER, MODE, CREATED_AT FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC
SELECT ID, USER_ID, QUESTION, ANSWER, MODE, CREATED_AT FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND MODE = #{mode} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO HEALTH_DATA USING (VALUES(1)) ON (ORDER_ID = #{orderId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HEALTH_DETAIL = #{healthDetail} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ORDER_ID, HEALTH_DETAIL) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{healthDetail});
